Scenario 8.expected result: Password should be in masked format.
Scenario 8.description: While inserting characters in password field they should be in masked format.
Scenario 8.title: Password field text should be masked

test steps.testStepId-1: Enter some password in password field

Scenario 1.expected result: Session time out should alert user
Scenario 1.description: Session time out should be set for secured website
Scenario 1.title: Session time out

Scenario 2.expected result: Locking or time delaying of login action
Scenario 2.description: If user tries to login few times unsuccessful, application should lock credentials.
Scenario 2.title: Unsuccessful attempts of login

Scenario 3.expected result: Application should not log in user
Scenario 3.description: If user is logged in chrome browser and wants to copy URL to another browser, application should send him to login page.
Scenario 3.title: Copying url to another browser

test steps.testStepId-1: Copy URL and paste it to firefox

Scenario 4.expected result: Warning message after email verification should appear
Scenario 4.description: User should be warned in case of entering username (email) without special characters like '@' or domains.
Scenario 4.title: Username verification

Scenario 5.expected result: Login action should appear after logout and back button
Scenario 5.description: After successful login and log out on back button application should send user on login page to login again.
Scenario 5.title: Logout action

Scenario 6.expected result: Login action should fail one character is replaced with the same but opposite in lower/upper case format
Scenario 6.description: If user want to use upper case letters in password field they should be treated different then lower case letters.
Scenario 6.title: Password field should be upper case sensitive

test steps.testStepId-2: Enter password in opposite characters (upper/lower case)

Scenario 7.expected result: The login action should work as it should
Scenario 7.description: If user wants to enter username as upper case it shouldn't be treated as invalid format.
Scenario 7.title: Username credential in upper case should not be treated as invalid

test steps.testStepId-1: Enter valid name in upper case letters
